title: Is Fantagio a good company to audition for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ofcourse!!! They usually treat their artists and trainees better… But getting into Fantagio ent. Is a bit difficult. You have to be extremely talented… I mean which ent. Does not look for talents?? If you don't make through try other companies….. Best of luck👍👍👍

I wouldn’t know about them personally. But the best way to find out is to call someone that has already done this. You cannot always believe message boards or chat rooms about the company. You need to find out first hand.
